ModMetaData.name: Free Go To 自由的移动目标点
ModMetaData.author: RunningBugs
ModMetaData.description:
The RimWorld 1.6 does not allow dragging your destination to an occupied cell. Although you can right click on that cell to move there, it is not convenient. This mod allows you to drag your destination to an occupied cell.
环世界1.6不允许将移动的目标点拖动到一个被其它小人占用的格子上。虽然你可以右键点击那个格子来移动到那里，但这有点麻烦。 这个mod允许你将目标点拖动到一个被占用的格子上。
